text:
Mineral Resources Development (Fossil Site) Order 2003

I make the following order under section 163(1) of the Mineral Resources Development Act 1995 .

11 December 2003

P. A. LENNON

Minister for Economic Development, Energy and Resources

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Mineral Resources Development (Fossil Site) Order 2003 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Fossil site
    The area of land specified in Schedule 1 to this order is declared to be a fossil site for the purposes of the Mineral Resources Development Act 1995 .

SCHEDULE 1 - Fossil Site

All that area of State forest in the vicinity of Lune Sugarloaf shown hatched and bounded by a heavy black line on Plan 6344 in the Central Plan Register, a reduced copy of which is set out, by way of illustration only, in Schedule 2 to this order.

SCHEDULE 2 - Plan

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 17 December 2003

This order is administered in the Department of Infrastructure, Energy and Resources.
